Back to the list

Pagination

Responsive pagination for your list pages. Can be useful not to load all your articles when using it in a blog.

File to include

@include "components/pagination";

Pagination Left

  • 1
  • 2
  • 3
  • ...
  • 10
<div class="pagination-container pagination-left">
     <ul class="pagination">
          <li>
               <a href="#"><i class="icon icon-chevron-left-solid"></i></a>
          </li>
          <li class="active"><a href="#">1</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">2</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">3</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">...</a></li>
          <li><a href="#">10</a></li>
          <li>
               <a href="#"><i class="icon icon-chevron-right-solid"></i></a>
          </li>
     </ul>
</div>
